mapper.select: select b.bookmark_id, b.deal_id, b.house_id, d.deal_area, d.deal_price, h.house_name, h.house_gugun_name, h.house_dong_name from bookmark b, deal d, house h where b.user_id = #{user_id} and b.deal_id = d.deal_id and h.house_id = d.house_id;
mapper.insert: insert into bookmark ( deal_id, user_id, house_id ) values ( #{dealId}, #{userId}, ( select house_id from deal where deal_id = #{dealId} ))
